title: Firewall Error is back
body:
I just experienced a firewall error in a game and was unable to reconnect. One other person on the team also experienced the same error but was able to reconnect within ~2 minutes.

ISP is TPG in Western Sydney on the unlimited NBN fibre plan.

replies.body: i am experienced firewall when i am opening LoL and i am also with TPG

I feel it's worth mentioning that I can't connect to any custom games or any other kind of game whatsoever so I literally can no longer play league of legends without purchasing a vpn subscription, not just the random firewall errors that happened before.

We believe this is due to the way some ISPs are routing our players to our data center. Please read here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select

then send us your details to ocelivereports@riotgames.com so we can work with you to troubleshoot.

Thank you
Does the diagnostics form that I filled out automatically email that address or do I have to do that manually after submitting the form?
We made a change on Friday, please read and report in this thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select
